description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.9M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Samson and Associates. The average
  contract duration was 1.05 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $161.8K. The longest
  contract was 4 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.3M.
